1.content:
Mike, Jack, and Ben were all in their own rooms that night. It was a weekend, so for these college boys it was party central. Well for most of them. Their party was over now, about 4AM. Jack and Ben had been the ones out partying. They had now had finally gotten home and to bed.

         Mike had spent his weekends studying. He was a huge bookworm, and was studying to become a lawyer. Being the youngest out of his roommates, and the smallest, they always picked on him. He is 5'2” and 110lbs. He was always the smallest guy wherever he went. He had deep green eyes, and chocolate brown hair. He was still studying that night when he heard his roommates come home. He had a huge exam in the morning. It was still quite dark out, when Mike looked up at the sky and saw a shooting star. He figured he had better make a wish.

         Jack had just gotten home from a night of partying. He managed to get quite a few ladies phone numbers that night. He noticed his nerdy roommate's light on and figured the nerd must be studying. He was so glad he didn't have to deal with studying. He was waiting for a big break to football stardom. He was quite the ladies-man at 5'9” and 220lbs of pure muscle. Clear blue eyes and spiky, dirty blond hair made him even more irresistible to the ladies. Jack was easily the biggest muscle-wise of his roommates. That made it easy to pick on little Mike and become ruler of the house. Jack made his way to his room, and was about ready for bed, when he peered out his window and saw a shooting star. He figured he had nothing to lose, so he made a wish.

         Ben had gotten home around the same time as Jack. Like Jack, Ben came home with quite a few numbers, but they were other mens' numbers. Ben had always been gay, and he was quite the twink at only 170lbs. At 6' exactly, he was the tallest and towered over Mike, and even Jack. His chestnut, hazel eyes and raven, black hair gave him the appearance of a 'bad boy'. He was a bit of a computer geek and was studying to be a computer technician. He picked on Mike himself, but not near as often as Jack did. Ben made his way to his room, saw Mike's light on and Jack walking to his own room. He was about to do a bit of last minute studying, and saw a shooting star. He had always been a huge sceptic, but tonight felt different somehow, so he made a wish.

Which character would you like to follow?
1.title: Who's Story Will You Follow?

choices: "I wish I was taller than Ben."
"I wish I was more muscular than Jack."
11.content:
Mike had always believed if you wished on a shooting star that your wish would come true. He made his wish and went to bed. He figured he was finally ready for his exam in the morning. That, and he had enough studying for the night. He fell asleep, quickly so he was able to get a few hours of sleep.

         Mike woke up feeling groggy. He kicked off his blanket, swung his legs over to the side of his bed and went to get up. Being so short his feet hung in the air.

         Mike was about to get up when he looked at his clock. It read twelve o'clock! He mustn’t have set his alarm! He was super late now as his test started at nine o'clock sharp! He figured he may be able to get another chance to write the test if he explains to his professor what happened.

         Mike got out of bed, then got dressed. He didn't worry about having his shower or anything. Then he rushed to his class. Class was over, but he figured his professor would be around still. When he got there the door was locked.

         “Oh no!” Mike thought. “He's not here! I'll have to wait until Monday now!”

         Mike already missed this test once before. His professor offered him a retest, but could only give it to him on Saturday. Mike didn't mind, as he didn't do anything except study on the weekends anyway. Now he missed his chance! He hoped that his professor would understand and give him a second retest.

         Mike went back to his room and figured he should now try and enjoy the weekend. He was so sick of studying from last night. It looked like his roommates were still sleeping from their drunk-fest last night. Mike lay on his bed thinking about his wish last night.

         What was this wish?
11.title: Mike's Wish

choices: Mike felt like he was taller. Growing even!
111.content:
“I wish I was the tallest.” Mike thought. “The first time I see a shooting star, and I wish for that? I could have wished for anything in the world! Even for Ben and Jack to stop picking on me.”

         Meanwhile, both his roommates had woken up and were getting out of bed. Jack walked by Mike's room, and paused for a moment. He felt dizzy for a moment. Mike watched Jack and figured he must be really hung over.

         “Morning Shorty!” Jack said to Mike. “What are you staring at?”

         “Just you, hungover,” Mike replied. “Party last night?”

         “Yeah man,” Jack said feeling another wave of dizziness. “You should have come. Would have been fun. Oh I forgot, you had that make-up test today. How did that go?”

         “I didn't make it,” Mike said disappointed. “I must have forgot to set my alarm...”

         “Hahahaha!” Jack couldn't help but laugh, loudly too. “Prank's on you man. I totally turned off your alarm.”

         “You ass!” Mike stood up. “I can't believe it! That's the worst thing you've done!”

         He walked over to Jack, and looked up. For some reason, he didn't have to look up as much. He swung his arm about to hit Jack. Jack caught Mike's arm, and twisted it backwards.

         “Oww!” Mike screamed in pain.

         “Don't ever try that again little guy,” Jack shouted. “Understand?”

         Mike nodded and Jack let go. It felt like Jack had almost broken his arm. Mike was almost in tears.

         “Aww,” Jack said. “Did I make the little baby cry?”

         Jack then felt yet another wave of dizziness! He was just wearing his underwear and a pair of socks as he hadn't gotten dressed yet. Mike didn't seem as small as he used to be. Jack found he didn't have to look down as far anymore.

         “Are you growing little guy?” Jack asked. “It's about time you had a growth spurt!”

         Jack walked into the kitchen. Mike watched as he did. He noticed something was off about it.
111.title: "I Wish I Was The Tallest."

choices: Jack wished to be absolutely jacked
Jack wished to be a wealthy fitness model
1111.content:
Jack headed into the kitchen, to prepare his morning smoothie. He laughed thinking about little Mike’s whining about his prank. Dude takes things too seriously, he thought to himself. He could feel Mike’s gaze on him, and he knew for all his complaining, Mike just loved staring at Jack’s muscled bod. Jack even made sure to do a couple stretches, to really accentuate his muscled back and arms.

As Jack got ready to prepare his smoothie, he headed over to the cabinet where he kept his protein powders and supplements. He always made sure to keep his stuff on one of the higher shelves, to keep out of reach of Mike who was always whining about wanting to get bigger. “Fucking shrimp,” Jack muttered to himself.

Jack reached up to grab one of his powders. That’s odd, he thought, he couldn’t quite reach the container. He stretched his arm, and still couldn’t reach.

Mike watched and stared as Jack clearly couldn’t reach the canister. Mike began to fantasize about Jack being shorter. Wouldn’t that serve him right? See what it was like to be a little guy…

Jack meanwhile had to get on his tippy toes, giving him enough leverage to grab the bottom of the canister, and bring it down. He dropped the canister, causing some of the powder to spill onto the floor. "Fuck!!" He cleaned the powder, and picked up the canister, placing it on the counter. He shook his head; he felt uncomfortable and strangely creeped out. He got lost in his thoughts for a few moments, and found himself staring at the bodybuilder on the canister. It was then he remembered the wish he had made last night.

He shook off the weird feeling and continued to make his protein shake. He went to grab a glass out of the cupboard and noticed that he was able to reach that. But it felt about the same height as all the times before today reaching for his protein powder...

He downed his shake and headed to the bathroom to check his weight. It was like a ritual for him. Every day he'd go check his weight on the scale at the same time of day. Though today, something felt different. He stepped on the scale and it showed 220 lbs. He looked in the mirror and noticed that he didn't fill as much of the mirror as before. Well... In height anyway. His muscles though appeared to be stronger and thicker than ever.

"Wow... Maybe my wish is coming true!" He thought to himself.

He still hadn't realized that even though he looked more muscular and was the same weight as before, something was different. His height was different! He was a couple inches shorter now, which made his musculature look that much bigger.

He went to his room to get dressed for the day. He slipped on a pair of designer jeans, as well as one of his tight fitting shirts. As soon as he put them on, he noticed something strange. The pant legs appeared to be a bit too long, longer than usual anyway. And his shirt, though still stretched across his muscular frame, hung a bit longer than usual. What the hell was going on?

Jack went back into the kitchen where Mike was. Jack grabbed Mike by the shoulder and turned him around.

"Dude, what did you do to my clothes? Is this funny to you?" Jack asked angrily.

"N-nothing," Mike stammered. "I swear!"

Jack appeared as though he was ready to clobber Mike. Mike braced himself for the worst, but then nothing happened. Jack had lost his balance, letting go of Mike and almost falling over. Jack had felt that dizzy feeling again. He regained his balance and Mike noticed something was off...

As Jack regained his balance and stood back upright, Mike noticed something was definitely off. Jack was now just a couple inches taller than him.

“What have I done?” Mike laughed, realizing his roommate was shrinking. “Holy fuck, dude! Look at you, you’re smaller!”

Jack looked at him confused. “No way, dude…”
111111.title: Jack had shrunk a couple more inches!

choices: Jack notices something is strange while working out!
1111111.content:
"You're just taller.... Right?" Jack said. "You must be having a growth spurt!"

"Y-yeah... maybe," Mike replied.

Mike knew what was really going on. His wish must be coming true for some reason. Not in the way he hoped however. His intention was to be tall like Jack and Ben. He wanted to be over 6' tall. Thinking to himself however, he realized that he may be able to have some fun with that. Paying closer attention to Jack, he noticed that Jack was definitely shorter than usual. However, if Jack was shorter, shouldn't his proportions be staying the same? Jack appeared to be more muscled than before.

"Pretty soon it looks like I won't get to call you shorty!" Jack smiled as he ruffled Mike's hair. "I'm heading out to the gym. This physique doesn't shape itself!"

Jack left and made his way to the gym. Mike decided to go to the gym as well. He didn't go often, and usually just ran on the treadmill when he did go. This time was different however. He wanted to see how Jack would handle his new height there!

Jack got to the gym and headed into the change room. He noticed that everything seemed slightly higher today. And a lot of the regulars seemed slightly taller than usual. They couldn't all have had growth spurts, that's not possible. Jack waved to a couple buddies across the change room, and went over to talk.

"Sick party last night, hey?" his buddy Alex asked him. "You got pretty drunk, you sure you're up for a workout today?"

"Of course I am!" Jack replied. "I'm always up for a workout. You know that!"

Jack noticed he had to look up to Alex. Alex had been 5'7" for years. Jack had known the guy since high school. There's no way he had a growth spurt! Jack figured it was just the hangover making him see things. But since when did hangovers do that?

"Dude..." Jack spoke, still looking up at Alex. "Did you grow? You're taller than me!"

"I haven't grown in years!" Alex replied. "You must be really hung over! I'm not taller than you. Your mind is playing tricks on you dude!"

Jack looked at his other buddy Brian. Brian had been 5'10" for a long time. Jack had to look up to him too. Weird. They were always so close in height. Jack pushed the thoughts out of his mind and started to change into his workout clothes.

Peeling off his shirt, he noticed it was still stretched tight across his frame the way he liked it. However, the shirt appeared much longer than earlier. He looked down at his pants and noticed that the pant cuffs had been dragging on the floor. He was going to kill Mike when he got back. Mike must have done this somehow to trick him. Jack changed into his muscle tee, which also hung long on his frame. Slipping on his gym shorts, he noticed that they no longer were above his knees, but now down covering his knees completely!

"Dude, you ready?" Brian said. "It looks like you stretched out your workout clothes man. I think it's time for some new ones!"

Jack knew that workout clothes stretched out of shape and all, but these were fairly new, and they still fit him in the waist. Usually that was the part that stretched out. Mike follows them shortly after into the weight room.

"Y-yeah," Jack answered. "I guess so."

Jack and his buddies head out into the weight room. Jack hadn't noticed yet, but he was down to 5'4" and still shrinking!

Mike watched from a distance as Jack and his buddies headed into the weight room. He couldn't wait to see how Jack would react when he finally noticed the shrinking!
1111111.title: “You’re just taller…. Right?”

1111112.content:
Jack regained his balance. He couldn’t explain it, but he felt strong, powerful. He looked at his arms, not noticing the shirt he was wearing was really long on him now. Damn, those guns were looking thick! Thicker than just moments ago.

He heard his roommate Mike then say, “Holy fuck, dude! Look at you, you’re smaller!”

“No way, dude,” Jack said, looking again at his arms and then flexing. “Smaller? You see these guns? I’m getting huge!!”

Mike was stunned, not believing how oblivious his roommate was acting. “But dude, c’mon. Look at me!” Jack just stared at him blankly. “C’mon, I must look taller to you now.... Right?”

Jack just stared at Mike, looking at him like he was crazy. “Taller? Dude, I know you’re short, but you now think you’re taller?…”

“No! Dude, look around. There’s no way you’re 5’10” still!”

“5’10”? You’re insane.” Jack responded, stunning his roommate, “I’ve always been 5’5”!”

135.title: Still the Same!

info.brief_description: Three college roommates wish on a shooting star one night. The wishes turn terribly wrong.
info.description:
Mike, Jack, and Ben are all college roommates. They are all very different and sometimes have difficulty getting along. One night, they are all in their own rooms and see a shooting star. Each of them makes a wish on it. After that, their wishes slowly start to come true. Follow each character to see how their wishes come true.

Mike is 18 years old and is studying to become a lawyer. He is quite short at 5'2", and also quite a slender guy being about 110lbs. He is shy and is usually pushed around by his bigger, bully roommates. He is also the youngest.

Jack is 25 years old and is on the college football team. He's hoping to be a football star someday. He is about 5'9” and 220lbs of pure muscle. He is the one doing most of the bullying, and pushing around. He is the oldest.

Ben is 22 years old and is studying to be a computer technician. He is 6' exactly, and about 170lbs. His weight doesn't seem to make him much of a threat, but his height is how he bullies Mike.

Pick one character to follow and see how everything changes for them.

Wishes will have to do with transformations. Mostly shrinking/growing. AR, AP, and Body Swap are welcome. Sex is alright as long as the characters are above 18 when these acts taking place. No vore, or crushing please.
